      • isFirmwareAtLeast

        boolean isFirmwareAtLeast​(java.lang.String version)
        Check if the glasses firmware is at least of the one provvided.
        Parameters:
        version - the version to compare the firmware version to.
        Returns:
        true if the argument version is lower or equal to the glasses firmware version and false otherwise.

      • compareFirmwareVersion

        int compareFirmwareVersion​(java.lang.String version)
        Compare the glasses firmware version with the version
        Parameters:
        version - the version to compare the firmware version to.
        Returns:
        the value 0 if the argument version is equal to the glasses firmware version; a value less than 0 if the glasses firmware version is lower than the version argument; and a value greater than 0 if the glasses firmware version is greater than the version argument.

        Disconnect.
